text: One of the coolest things about trading is that it is truly one of the few ways you can Straight up be your own boss because there are no customers. There are no businesses. There are no products. There are no product managers that you have to work with to design something. It's literally all your ability to interface with the market and make money. But for a lot of people there in lies the very same downfall because you have to hold yourself accountable for everything. Did you do good research? Did you execute a trade as you should? And the reality is the vast majority of traders just kind of stumble into this thing and they're not ready to do those things. And most of those traders will fail. But if you apply the correct methodology you absolutely can learn to trade. It's just that you have to close the gap between how easy you think it's going to be and how difficult it really is. Be an all-air sailater.
